timeline.body: This would notify twice on broadcasts that have links. I recommend combining the bodies of these two conditional blocks by doing the following: make a guard clause for `config.notifyOnBroadcast()`, then a check for `broadcast.lastIndexOf('|')` being `-1` (if it isn't, get the substring prior to that vertical bar). Finally, remove the formatting tags, then notify that string.
